resources.string: "SMART KIDS LEARNING" is the best learning app for kids to learn alphabets, numbers, colors, match and more! This app for Kindergarten, pre-school children and toddlers! Kids Pre-school Learning - alphabets, numbers, colors, shapes, animals, flags, fruits, vegetables, \u0026 planets all of these are included here.
Copyright \u00A9 2020 Android Team, BITI, Ltd. \nAll rights reserved under ICT Division.
